name: CompoundBasicProxy
description: Basic compound interactions through the DSProxy.

functionDecorators.name: borrow
functionDecorators.description: User borrows tokens to the Compound protocol.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddr
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to be borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _inMarket
parameterDecorators.description: True if the tokend is already in market for that address.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: User deposits tokens to the Compound protocol. User needs to approve the DSProxy to pull the _tokenAddr tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddr
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to be deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: _inMarket
parameterDecorators.description: True if the tokend is already in market for that address.

functionDecorators.name: enterMarket
functionDecorators.description: Enters the Compound market so it can be deposited/borrowed.

functionDecorators.name: exitMarket
functionDecorators.description: Exits the Compound market so it can't be deposited/borrowed.

functionDecorators.name: payback
functionDecorators.description: User paybacks tokens to the Compound protocol. User needs to approve the DSProxy to pull the _tokenAddr tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddr
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to be paybacked.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be payedback.

parameterDecorators.name: _wholeDebt
parameterDecorators.description: If true the _amount will be set to the whole amount of the debt.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: User withdraws tokens to the Compound protocol.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddr
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: _isCAmount
parameterDecorators.description: If true _amount is cTokens if falls _amount is underlying tokens.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawTokens
functionDecorators.description: Helper method to withdraw tokens from the DSProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddr
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the token to be withdrawn.
